channel.title: Economic Policy on Skycoin Project Material
channel.description: Recent content in Economic Policy on Skycoin Project Material

item.title: Skycoin Economic Policy
item.description: We have been talking to a large Bitcoin market marker about how we can prevent a repeat of the Auroacoin crash and deter speculators. We have a data guy doing models. This is the linear scale Bitcoin price over time This is log scale Bitcoin price, with regression line. When Bitcoin is over the line its over priced, when its below the line its underpriced. This is the total number of subscribers in /r/bitcoin This is the daily growth rate of subscribers in /r/bitcoin .
